title: Coordinate Professional Home Staging
description: A listing agent advises a seller to use a professional stager to improve the home's appeal and coordinates the process.

tasks.description: Explain the benefits of staging and provide the seller with a list of preferred staging companies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent effectively communicates the value proposition of staging.

tasks.description: Schedule a consultation between the seller and the selected staging company.
tasks.expected_outcome: A consultation appointment is successfully booked.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the stager and photographer to ensure the home is staged before photos are taken.
tasks.expected_outcome: Staging and photography are completed in the correct sequence before the listing goes live.
